p.b: If you heat water at 100 degrees, it boils.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 462px; height: 1px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 345px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.b: e.g. If it rains, I will stay at home.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 452px; height: 1px; padding-top: 300px; margin-left: 345px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.b: e.g. If I won a million dollars, I would buy a new house.

div.b: e.g. If he had studied languages at the school, he would have more opportunities now.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 462px; height: 1px; padding-top: 800px; margin-left: 340px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 180px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 23px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

b.font: e.g. If my phone had not broken, I would call you tonight.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 452px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1020px; margin-left: 340px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.b: e.g. If I had more money now, I would have bought that car yesterday.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 452px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1125px; margin-left: 345px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 160px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 21px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.b: e.g. If she had more time, she would study another language (in the future).

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 452px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1310px; margin-left: 345px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.b: e.g. If my parents weren't coming on Sunday, I would have offered to help you.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 442px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1410px; margin-left: 340px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 170px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 21px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.b: e.g. If I were going on holiday tomorrow, I would be so excited(now).

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
